org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.petstore

Class PetStoreService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.petstore.AbstractPersistenceService
      • org.apache.juneau.examples.rest.petstore.PetStoreService

  • public class PetStoreService
extends AbstractPersistenceService
    Pet store database application.

    Uses JPA persistence to store and retrieve PetStore DTOs. JPA beans are defined in META-INF/persistence.xml.
